bioAsHtml: I am developer with +10 years of experience, mostly in the JVM. I'm also co-organizer of scala.io as well as the Paris Scala User Group (psug). I currently work at Fabernovel (previously Zengularity) and previously at Xebia. I've been a speaker at scala.io in 2016 as well as in several meetups in Paris including psug, Paris Software Craftsmanship among others.

bio: I am developer with +10 years of experience, mostly in the JVM. I'm also co-organizer of scala.io as well as the Paris Scala User Group (psug). I currently work at Fabernovel (previously Zengularity) and previously at Xebia.
